The way out of the

EPS ensemble mean
EPS ensemble mean

The ensemble mean is not only the most accurate, it is by far also the least “jumpy” • While the T511 makes an average 24 hour “jump” of 2 - 4°K, the T255 ensemble mean is stable at around 1° K

One solution is to create ”synoptic” EPS maps in the old Bergen School tradition: combine several parameters in the same map!
